typography.headline: thin elegant serif, deep mauve #4A3540, editorial fashion
typography.accent_text: rose gold or white on dusty rose

person.outfit_hook: dusty rose silk blouse OR soft pink cashmere, editorial fashion
person.outfit_cta: cream or white elegant top, minimal rose gold jewelry
person.lighting: soft diffused pink-tinted light, editorial beauty lighting
person.aesthetic: high-fashion editorial, Vogue-style portrait, soft glam

decorations.elements: dried roses, soft fabric draping, rose petals, elegant minimalism
decorations.3d_objects: rose gold geometric shapes, pink-tinted glass elements
decorations.particles: soft pink petals floating, rose gold dust

prompt_blocks.background: Background: soft blush pink gradient, flowing from pale pink #FFF5F5 through blush #FFE4E1 to soft rose #FFC0CB. Soft diffused editorial lighting. High-fashion magazine aesthetic.
prompt_blocks.cards_content: Frosted glass cards with soft pink tint rgba(255,245,245,0.7). Subtle rose border rgba(183,110,121,0.2). Delicate shadow. Elegant corners 16px. Editorial magazine layout feel.
prompt_blocks.cards_headline: Elegant editorial banner, thin serif typography (Didot/Bodoni style). Deep mauve text #4A3540. Rose gold accent line. High-fashion magazine headline aesthetic.
prompt_blocks.person_hook: Generate person EXACTLY as shown in reference photo. Match all facial features precisely. Outfit: dusty rose silk blouse or soft pink cashmere, editorial fashion. Soft glam makeup, dewy skin. Pose: [POSE]. Expression: [EMOTION], editorial, expressive. Lighting: soft beauty lighting, pink-tinted. CRITICAL: Do NOT invent facial features.
prompt_blocks.person_cta: Generate person EXACTLY as shown in reference photo. Match all facial features precisely. Outfit: cream or white elegant top, minimal rose gold jewelry. Soft natural makeup. Pose: elegant gesture toward CTA card. Expression: warm, inviting, soft confident smile. Lighting: soft flattering glow. CRITICAL: Do NOT invent facial features.
prompt_blocks.decorations_hook: Decorative elements: dried roses in soft pink, delicate fabric draping, rose petals floating. [PROPS] with rose/pink treatment. Soft pink particles in air.
prompt_blocks.cta_card: Elegant frosted pink card with rose gold border and soft glow. Top line (deep mauve #4A3540): '–ü–ò–®–ò:'. Main line (LARGE, rose gold #B76E79, elegant glow): '[PRODUCT_CODE]'. Soft rose petals and sparkles around.
prompt_blocks.viral_elements: Elegant paper airplane in rose gold and pink. Share icons in soft rose tones. Floating rose petals. Button with rose border: 'üíæ –°–û–•–†–ê–ù–ò'.
prompt_blocks.style_footer: STYLE: Photorealistic, high-fashion editorial quality. Soft diffused lighting with pink tint. Vogue magazine aesthetic. Elegant, feminine, sophisticated. 8K resolution.
